trans-unit.source: Getting Information About Commands
trans-unit.target: 取得命令的相關資訊

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Getting Information About Commands
trans-unit.target: 取得命令的相關資訊

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell **Get-Command** cmdlet gets all commands that are available in your current session.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell **Get-Command** Cmdlet 能取得您目前工作階段中所有可用的命令。

trans-unit.source: When you type **Get-Command** at a Windows PowerShell prompt, you will see output similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: 當您在 Windows PowerShell 命令提示字元輸入 **Get-Command** 時，您會看到如下輸出：

trans-unit.source: This output looks a lot like the Help output of Cmd.exe: a tabular summary of internal commands.
trans-unit.target: 此輸出與 Cmd.exe 的「說明」輸出 (內部命令的表格式摘要) 十分相似。

trans-unit.source: In the excerpt of the **Get-Command** command output shown above, every command shown has a CommandType of Cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如上面 **Get-Command** 命令輸出的摘要所示，每個顯示的命令都有一個屬於 Cmdlet 的 CommandType。

trans-unit.source: A cmdlet is Windows PowerShell's intrinsic command type – a type that corresponds roughly to the **dir** and **cd** commands of Cmd.exe and to built-ins in UNIX shells such as BASH.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet 是 Windows PowerShell 的內建命令類型，大致上是對應到 Cmd.exe 的 **dir** 和 **cd** 命令，以及 UNIX 殼層的內建項 (例如 BASH)。

trans-unit.source: In the output of the **Get-Command** command, all the definitions end with ellipses (...) to indicate that PowerShell cannot display all the content in the available space.
trans-unit.target: 在 **Get-Command** 命令的輸出中，所有定義的結尾都是省略符號 (...)，表示 PowerShell 無法在可用空間內顯示所有內容。

trans-unit.source: When Windows PowerShell displays output, it formats the output as text and then arranges it to make the data fit cleanly into the window.
trans-unit.target: 當 Windows PowerShell 顯示輸出時，它會將輸出格式化為文字，並將其排列以在視窗中整齊地顯示。

trans-unit.source: We will talk about this later in the section on formatters.
trans-unit.target: 我們將稍後在格式化相關的章節中討論此內容。

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Command** cmdlet has a **Syntax** parameter that gets the syntax of each cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **Get-Command** Cmdlet 具有一個可取得各 Cmdlet 語法的 **Syntax** 參數。

trans-unit.source: To get the syntax of the Get-Help cmdlet, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 Get-Help Cmdlet 的語法，請使用下列命令：

trans-unit.source: Get-Command Get-Help -Syntax
trans-unit.target: Get-Command Get-Help -Syntax

trans-unit.source: Displaying Available Command Types
trans-unit.target: 顯示可用的命令類型

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Command** command does not list every command that is available in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Get-Command** 命令不會列出 Windows PowerShell 中所有可用的命令。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the **Get-Command** command lists only the cmdlets in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 反之，**Get-Command** 命令只會列出目前工作階段中的 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell actually supports several other types of commands.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 實際上支援一些其他類型的命令。

trans-unit.source: Aliases, functions, and scripts are also Windows PowerShell commands, although they are not discussed in detail in the Windows PowerShell User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 Windows PowerShell 使用者手冊中沒有詳細討論別名、函式與指令碼，但它們也是 Windows PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: External files that are executable, or have a registered file type handler, are also classified as commands.
trans-unit.target: 可執行或具有已登錄檔案類型處理常式的外部檔案，也分類為命令。

trans-unit.source: To get all commands in the session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要取得工作階段中的所有命令，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: Because this list includes external files in your search path, it may contain thousands of items.
trans-unit.target: 因為此清單包含您搜尋路徑中的外部檔案，其中可能會有數千個項目。

trans-unit.source: It is more useful to look at a reduced set of commands.
trans-unit.target: 所以查看一組精簡過的命令會更實用。

trans-unit.source: To get native commands of other types, use the **CommandType** parameter of the **Get-Command** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得其他類型的原生命令，請使用 **Get-Command** Cmdlet 的 **CommandType** 參數。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk (\*) is used for wildcard matching in Windows PowerShell command arguments.
trans-unit.target: 星號 (\*) 在 Windows PowerShell 命令引數中用於萬用字元比對。

trans-unit.source: The \* means "match one or more of any characters".
trans-unit.target: \* 表示「符合一或多個任意字元」。

trans-unit.source: You can type **Get-Command a\*** to find all commands that begin with the letter "a".
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入 **Get-Command a\*** 來尋找開頭為字母 "a" 的所有命令。

trans-unit.source: Unlike wildcard matching in Cmd.exe, Windows PowerShell's wildcard will also match a period.
trans-unit.target: 與 Cmd.exe 中萬用字元比對不同的是，Windows PowerShell 的萬用字元也會比對句號。

trans-unit.source: To get command aliases, which are the assigned nicknames of commands, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要取得命令別名 (指派給命令的暱稱)，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: To get the functions in the current session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作階段中的函式，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: To display scripts in Windows PowerShell's search path, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示 Windows PowerShell 搜尋路徑中的指令碼，請輸入：
